name: Dimensions (itch) (Tarcísio Costa, juninhostrife)
description:
All dimensions were shattered when a mad scientist tried to replicate the Big Bang.

Our hero, Greeny, has to collect star fragments by traveling through dimensions to fix the universe. Be aware: going into a deeper dimension requires more energy!

Gameplay:

Traverse level collecting energy / items / solving puzzles. Solve the puzzles and bring the dimensions back to harmony.



Controls:
  • Left, Right / A, D: Move
  • Spacebar: Jump
  • Up Key / W: Enter door
  • Z: Go Back One Dimension
  • X: Go To a Deeper Dimension (when enough fragments have been collected)
Screenshots:


Credits:

Developed by Tarcísio Costa and Edimilson Ribeiro da Rocha Júnior.
